home.header: Get to know my experience and my projects
about.header: I am passionate about reading, learning, applying and sharing knowledge about JavaScript implementation
about.fParagraph: My name is Nicolas,  I'm a veterinarian with solid professional experience in the field, and since I'm always going one step further I've decided to expand my knowledge and skills in the fascinating world of IT.
about.sParagraph: Considering the undeniable impact that technology has on daily life and motivated by global changes that compel the preparation and development of IT skills, I started a learning path focused on understanding JavaScript and its application in web development. With discipline, dedication and persistence, I've managed to understand and absorb the knowledge acquired in my personal projects and I'm ready to portray it in the future projects I'll be involved in, looking forward to provide the highest quality results.
about.subTitle: React-hooks (Cornell Notes)
